00037 #include "cmod.h"
00038 #include <clogger.h>

00044 
00048 class cloghistmod : public cmod {
00049         protected:
00050                 static const char _id[];
00051                 static const char _menu[];
00052 
00053                 void act( clogger * );
00054 
00056                 void range_get( clogger::size_type &, clogger::size_type & );
00057 
00059                 void navi_dump(clogger::size_type, clogger::size_type, 
00060                         clogger::size_type );
00061 
00062         public:
00063                 cloghistmod(cenvironment &e) : cmod(e) { modinfo=mi_menu; }
00064                 const char *id() { return _id; }
00065                 const char *name() { return ""; }
00066                 const char *menu() { return _menu; }
00067                 const char *conf() { return ""; }
00068                 char run();
00069 };
